headline: BNY Announces Pricing of Public Offering of $500,000,000 of Depositary Shares Representing Interests in Preferred Stock
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation ("BNY") (NYSE: BK), a global financial services company, today announced that it priced an underwritten public offering of 500,000 depositary shares, each representing a 1/100th interest in a share of its Series L Noncumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, with a liquidation preference of $100,000 per share (equivalent to $1,000 per depositary share), at a public offering price of $1,000 per depositary share ($500,000,000 aggregate public offering price).
